control.tasks: Prepare FAOSTAT database

control.Title: Trade Flow settings
control.tasks: Prepare FAOSTAT database,

control.Title: Trade Consolidation Steps
control.Options: SELECT "Select data and save in smaller gdx-files" AGGTRADE "Aggregations" UVATRADE "Calculate unit values" STATRADE "Some basic statistics" TRDTRADE "Estimate linear trends" INITRADE "Initialise expected means and standard deviations" MODTRADE "Solve for trade consolidation" SHOWTRADE "Reduce model results" ExportGUI "Export results for visualisation" ExportGlobal "Export results for global_database.gms"
control.tooltip: The trade flow consolidation is divided into 10 consolidation steps. \n The main reason is for debugging and memory issues. If an error appears in one of the later steps one does not have to start from the beginning. The intermediate results are stored in the scratch directory. Only the outputs of the last two steps enter the results directory and end up under version control.

control.Title: Dampening of high activity level elasticities
control.tasks: Baseline calibration supply models

control.Title: Policy blocks (additional geographical layer)
control.tasks: Baseline calibration market model,Run scenario with market model,Run scenario only with market model
control.tooltip:
The new market layer defines an additional geographical layer of country aggregates
with homogenous border protection and market intervention measures (e.g. EU, MERCOSUR countries).
If switched on, all trade policies (tariffs under trq, entry price system, intervention, flexible levies)
are defined at the new geographical level.
Be aware that before running a scenario, you need to re-calibrate the model with this option switched on.
For more information contact Mihaly Himics.

workstep.name: Build database
workstep.tasks: Prepare national database, Finish national database, Find No of fts in Nuts2, Define fts from FSS, Compile RDP data, Build regional time series, Build regional database, Prepare FAOSTAT database, Build global database, Estimate GHG emission coefficients, Build HSMU database

workstep.name: Generate baseline
workstep.tasks: Generate expost results, Generate trend projection, Generate farm type trends, Baseline calibration market model, Baseline calibration supply models, Baseline calibration farm types, HSMU baseline, Calibrate CGE, Re-calibrate behavioural functions CGE, Run test shocks with CGE, Check original Aglink results

workstep.name: Run scenario
